enroll: Not eligible for College Credit Plus program
description: Introduction to the UNIX programming environment including: shell programming (csh); regular expressions; makefiles; grep, sed, and awk programming languages.Prereq: 2122, 2123, or 2231; and 2321; and enrollment in CSE, CIS, ECE, Engr Physics, or Data Analytics major, or CIS minor. This course is graded S/U.
